AddProfileByLinkOrContentScreen.subscriptionCannotEmpty: Profile Link can not be empty
AddProfileByLinkOrContentScreen.configExist: The Profile already exists, please do not add it repeatedly

AddProfileByLinkOrContentScreen.addFailedFormatException: The format is wrong, please correct it and add it again:
AddProfileByLinkOrContentScreen.addFailedThenDownloadAndImport: Add failed: $p, please try to modify the [UserAgent] and try again, or use the device's built-in browser to open the configuration link and import the configuration file downloaded by the browser into this application

AddProfileByScanQrcodeScanScreen.scanException: Failed to parse the image, please make sure the screenshot is a valid QR code:$p

BackupAndSyncLanSyncScreen.title: LAN Sync
BackupAndSyncLanSyncScreen.lanSyncNotQuitTips: Do not exit this interface before synchronization is completed

DiversionGroupCustomEditScreen.invalidRuleSet: Invalid [Rule Set]:$p, The URL must be a valid https URL and a binary file with the file extension .srs/.json
DiversionGroupCustomEditScreen.invalidRuleSetBuildIn: Invalid [Rule Set(build-in)]:$p, The format is geosite:xxx or geoip:xxx or acl:xxx, and xxx should be a valid rule name
DiversionGroupCustomEditScreen.setDiversionRule: Tip: After saving, please go to [Diversion Rules] to set relevant rules, otherwise they will not take effect

DiversionRulesScreen.diversionRulesMatchTips: Try to match the rules from top to bottom. If no rule is matched, use final

DnsSettingsScreen.dnsDesc:
The first column of delay data is the direct connection query delay;
The second column: Turn on [[Proxy Traffic]Resolve DNS through proxy server]: the delay data is the query delay forwarded through the current proxy server; if the [[Proxy Traffic]Resolve DNS through proxy server]: The delay data is the direct connection query delay

FeedbackScreen.contentCannotEmpty: Feedback content can not be empty

FileContentViewerScreen.title: File Content Viewer
FileContentViewerScreen.clearFileContent: Are you sure to clear the content of the file?
FileContentViewerScreen.clearFileContentTips: Are you sure to clear the content of the Profile file? Clearing the Profile file may cause data loss or abnormal application functions, please operate with caution

HomeScreen.expiredServer: No servers available, profiles may be expired or disabled
HomeScreen.myLinkEmpty: Please set up [Shortcut Link] before using it
HomeScreen.tooMuchServers: Too many proxy servers [$p>$p1], and the connection may fail due to system memory limitations

LaunchFailedScreen.invalidProcess: The app failed to start [Invalid process name], please reinstall the app to a separate directory
LaunchFailedScreen.invalidProfile: The app failed to start [Failed to access the profile], please reinstall the app
LaunchFailedScreen.invalidVersion: The app failed to start [Invalid version], please reinstall the app
LaunchFailedScreen.systemVersionLow: The app failed to start [system version too low]
LaunchFailedScreen.startFromUNC: The installation path is invalid, please reinstall it to a valid path

MyProfilesEditScreen.urlExist: URL already exists, please use another URL
MyProfilesEditScreen.testLatencyAfterProfileUpdate: Start latency tests after Profile Automatically update
MyProfilesEditScreen.testLatencyAfterProfileUpdateTips: VPN needs to be connected, and [Reload after Profile update] Enabled
MyProfilesEditScreen.testLatencyAutoRemove: Automatically remove servers that fail latency tests

MyProfilesMergeScreen.profilesMergeTips: Tip: Diversion of the source profiles will be discarded

MyProfilesScreen.title: Profiles
MyProfilesScreen.atLeastOneEnable: Cannot be disabled, please keep at least one profile enable

NetCheckScreen.title: Net Check
NetCheckScreen.warn: Note: Due to the influence of network environment and diversion rules, the test results are not completely equivalent to the actual results.
NetCheckScreen.connectivityTestIpv6AllFailed: Ipv6 Connection test [$p] all failed, Your network may not support ipv6
NetCheckScreen.connectivityTestOk: The network is connected to the Internet
NetCheckScreen.connectivityTestFailed: The network is not yet connected to the Internet
NetCheckScreen.dnsOk:
[$p1]DNS query succeeded
DNS Rule:[$p2]
Latency:[$p3 ms]
Address:[$p4]

PerAppAndroidScreen.title: Per-App Proxy
PerAppAndroidScreen.whiteListModeTip: When enabled: only the apps that have been checked are proxies; when not enabled: only the apps that are not checked are proxies

QrcodeScreen.tooLong: The text is too long to display

RegionSettingsScreen.title: Country Or Region
RegionSettingsScreen.Regions: Tip: Please set your current country or region correctly, otherwise it may cause network diversion problems

ServerSelectScreen.title: Select Server
ServerSelectScreen.autoSelectServer: Auto select the server with the lowest latency
ServerSelectScreen.selectLocal: The selected server is a local address and may not work properly:$p
ServerSelectScreen.selectRequireEnableIPv6: The selected server is an IPv6 address and requires [Enable IPv6]
ServerSelectScreen.error404: Latency detection encountered an error, please check if there is a configuration with the same content

SettingsScreen.downloadProfilePreferProxyTips: If currently connected, the profile will be downloaded through the connected proxy first
SettingsScreen.ipStrategyTips: Before enabling, please confirm that your network supports IPv6, otherwise some traffic cannot be accessed normally.
SettingsScreen.tunAppendHttpProxyTips: Some apps will bypass virtual NIC Device and directly connect to HTTP proxy
SettingsScreen.dnsEnableRuleTips: After enabling, the domain name will select the corresponding DNS server for resolution according to the diversion rules
SettingsScreen.dnsEnableFakeIpTips: After enabling FakeIP, if the VPN connection is disconnected, your application needs to be restarted
SettingsScreen.dnsTypeOutboundTips: Domain name resolution for Proxy Server
SettingsScreen.dnsTypeDirectTips: Domain name resolution for Direct Traffic
SettingsScreen.dnsTypeProxyTips: Domain name resolution for Proxy Traffic
SettingsScreen.dnsTypeResolverTips: Domain name resolution for Other DNS Server
SettingsScreen.dnsTypeFinalTips: Domain name resolution for Other Traffic
SettingsScreen.inboundDomainResolveTips: Turning it off may affect IP-based diversion rules; turning [FakeIP] on, this function is equivalent to turning off
SettingsScreen.geoSiteAppleDirectTips: When turned on, Apple GeoSite[apple,apple-ads,apple-dev,apple-pki,apple-update] will use the direct connection mode to obtain a better network experience
SettingsScreen.autoSelectServerUpdateCurrentServerAfter: Update the Current Server after Manual Latency Check
SettingsScreen.autoSelectServerIntervalTips: The shorter the time interval, the more timely the server latency data updates, which will occupy more resources and consume more power
SettingsScreen.autoSelectServerFavFirstTips: If the [My Favs] list is not empty, Then use the servers in [My Favs]
SettingsScreen.autoSelectServerFilterTips: Server latency checks that fail will be filtered out; if no server is available after filtering, the first [$p] servers will be used instead
SettingsScreen.autoSelectServerLimitedNumTips: Servers exceeding this number will be filtered out
SettingsScreen.sortServerTips: Sort by latency from low to high
SettingsScreen.autoSetSystemProxy: Auto Set System Proxy when Connected
SettingsScreen.rewriteConfirm: This file will overwrite the existing local configuration. Do you want to continue?
SettingsScreen.tunStrictRouteTips: If after turning on sharing, others cannot access this device, please try turning off this switch
SettingsScreen.clusterAllowOtherHostsConnect: Allow Others to Connect to Cluster
SettingsScreen.clusterConfirm: Please confirm that the servers latency have been checked, and proxy services will not be created if they are not checked or checked incorrectly
SettingsScreen.tunModeTips: The TUN mode will take over all the traffic of the system [In this mode, you can leave the system proxy unenabled]
SettingsScreen.tunModeRunAsAdmin: The TUN mode requires system administrator permissions, please restart the app as an administrator
SettingsScreen.quitWhenSwitchSystemUser: Exit App when Switch System Users
SettingsScreen.portableModeDisableTips: If you need to exit portable mode, please exit [karing] and manually delete the [profiles] folder in the same directory as [karing.exe]
SettingsScreen.timeConnectOrDisconnectTips: VPN must be connected to take effect; after it is turned on, [Automatic Sleep] will be disabled
SettingsScreen.timeConnectAndDisconnectInterval: The connection/disconnection interval cannot be less than $p minutes

CommonWidget.diableAlwayOnVPN: If [Always on VPN] is turned on, please turn off [Always on VPN] and try connecting again

ServerManager.noServerAvaliable: No server avaliable, Make sure the Profile Link or Profile File is valid;  if your Profile comes from GitHub, please obtain the link from the [Raw] button on the page
ServerManager.filePathCannotEmpty: The file path can not be empty

rulesetEnableTips: Tip: After turning on the options, please go to[Diversion Rules]to set the relevant rules, otherwise they will not take effect
